Description:
You have failed to ensure that construction work is being carried out by operatives who have the skills, knowledge and experience to carry out the work safely and without risks to health or under the supervision of a person with relevant skills, knowledge, and experience.  This being a matter under your control.

You have not employed or appointed a person to supervise or manage construction work who has the necessary training to carry out the tasks allocated to that person in a manner that secures the health and safety of any person working on the construction site.
